A '''potion of Poison''' is a potion that provides [[Poison]] when used.

== Obtaining ==
===Generated Loot===
{{LootChestItem|splash-potion-of-poison}}

In [[Bedrock Edition]], the cauldron in a [[swamp hut]] has a 25% chance of containing a potion of Poison.

=== Base potion ===
Potion of Poison is a base for brewing [[potions of Harming]].
{{Brewing
|head = 1
|Fermented Spider Eye
|base = Potion of Poison
|Potion of Harming
|showvariants = 1
}}
{{Brewing
|Fermented Spider Eye
|base = Potion of Poison Enhanced
|Potion of Harming Enhanced
|name = Potion of Harming II
|ingredients = [[Fermented Spider Eye]] +<br>'''Potion of Poison II'''
|showvariants = 1
|foot = 1
}}
